author: Simon Difford
description: A fairly dry, complex cocktail. Generous sweet vermouth and orange juice make the Bronx less bitter and fruitier than many of its era, but still challenging to delicate modern palates. A classic that needs a trio of something extras to give it zing;1. Freshly squeezed orange juice2. Orange bitters3. Orange zest twist
name: Bronx

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
